thread.title: Luke Bryan makes heartfelt surprise to fans
thread.title_full: Luke Bryan makes heartfelt surprise to fans | www.daytondailynews.com

author: daytondailynews
title: Luke Bryan makes heartfelt surprise to fans
text:
Country superstar Luke Bryan is at it again. This time, he's helping out a woman who donated her kidney to her very sick mother.
The woman, Diane Taylor, said her kidneys were failing and doctors said if she didn’t get a transplant, she would die. Thanks to Taylor’s daughter, Lisa, she now has a new lease on life.
>> Read more trending stories
Lisa is a huge Luke Bryan fan and said his music helped the family through tough times, including during the transplant process.
Bryan heard their story and was so moved that he wanted to do something special for the mother-daughter duo.
This was such an amazing experience.. Hate y’all didn’t get to see it on TV, but it’s too good not to share. https://t.co/i2TxC1YP56
— Luke Bryan (@LukeBryanOnline) October 22, 2015
